title: Deploy Torii Browser Ext and how to I enabled Firefox Enterprise to function.
content:
Hello, and good day. Some of my employees in our org have been using Mozilla as their preferred browser; however, I am having difficulty deploying or managing the browser to deploy the Torii Extension/add-on.

Torii provided me with this link https://support.toriihq.com/hc/en-us/.../5148326594203-Deploy-the-Firefox-Extension to deploy the extension but still to no avail. Can someone assist me with getting this tested and deployed?

Thank you!
creator: eldin1

title: Random Firefox popup when starting Firefox
content:
Just restarted PC and opened Firefox, but with my normal Firefox, another page popped up which was a Firefox guest page on the website:

moz-extension://42c45938-6520-42aa-9359-a19de1 12eaf2/js/common /indexhtmizcontentType=notify_shutdown_ti#entry=sync

The website was "Not Secure" so I just closed out of it, was wondering if this is a cause for worry or if it's just a minor issue. All help is appreciated, thanks.

title: Traditional Chinese characters appearing in text boxes
content: This morning I find Firefox text windows displaying traditional Chinese characters replacing most, but not all, of the English text. I checked the language in use and made sure it was American English. I restarted in Troubleshooting Mode and cleared the cache. The problem persists. I can find no data on this problem at BleepingComputer.com. I suspect outside interference by a third party but cannot prove this. What can I do to eliminate this problem?
creator: progan01

title: History deleted after update
content: I frequently use the website Cookie Clicker. After Firefox updated, all the history/cookies for Cookie Clicker seems to have been deleted. I think that only the Cookie Clicker website has been affected... which sucks because I made a LOT of progress in that game. Is there a way to fix this, or am I out of luck?

title: Firefox URL/Search box and results drop down show diagonal pink line background
content:
With the last update I suddenly have the url/search box background and its search results drop down background set to an ugly pink with diagonal lines.

I am visually impaired and now its almost impossible to use firefox because I can't read the text on top of the diagonal colored bands. There doesn't seem to be any settings to turn on or off this appearance.

I will have to switch browsers until this is fixed and I don't want to.
creator: tniec

title: firefox unrespnsive because tabs crash
content:
My issue is that as soon as I open Firefox, the tab crashes. Open a new tab and it crashes. Unable to add content from the search bar before a tab crash.

I've tried troubleshoot mode and the tabs still crash. Refreshed FF and still tabs crash Uninstalled and reinstalled, but tabs still crash. I have no extensions running

There are no crash reports because FF is running but unresponsive due to tab issues. I'm out of ideas for using my favourite browser.

FF was working on my new Dell all in one, but this issue started about 3 days ago and I've been trying everything to make FF work again.

title: Stop auto-switching focus from bookmark library to main window.
content:
I have 2 issues i need resolving.

First, i want to stop Firefox from switching focus from library manager window to main window whenever i open a link (Note: it does not happen when i choose multiple links at-once).

Second, the link i opened should open in a new tab rather then an active tab.

title: My Firefox Account Has Been Interfered With
content:
When I logged on today, I realized that my Firefox homepage was not displayed. Only three Firefox webpages were displayed.

Furthermore, when I did open a new page, it was not my homepage. All of my homepage icons have been replaced with many others; Reddit, Wikipedia and such. None of mine were displayed.

When I opened GMail, my Inbox font size had been changed.

Does this mean that I have been hacked?

title: Přihlášení k účtu Firefox
content: Dobrý den, již několik let používám Firefox a mám vytvořený svůj účet. Tento týden se mi však vždy po vypnutí PC a opětovného zapnutí zobrazuje nutnost opětovného přihláčení k účtu Firefox, což se mi v minulosti nestávalo.. Přitom vždy dávám heslo uložit... Prosím o informaci, jak postupovat, abych se nemusel po spuštění Firefoxu stále přihlašovat ke svému účtu a zůstal TRVALE přihlášen. Děkuji za pomoc. Jaroslav Vojtek, Praha mail: vojtek@centrum.cz

title: Non riesco a visualizzare i video mov
content:

ho scaricato e insatllato QuickTime sul pc, ho cambiato il impostazioni, ho anche installato i plug-in per il web come indicato su questa giuda

https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/Informazioni%20sul%20plugin%20QuickTime?redirectslug=Using+the+QuickTime+plugin+with+Firefox&redirectlocale=en-US#w_verificare-linstallazione-di-quicktime

ma nulla, nella schermata plugin di firefox QuickTime non c'è...

Grazie

creator: caspah

title: Cannot login email provider
content: I use outlook to merge my emails from several different providers. Due to a software update, I had to login and confirm the IMAP password of on particular email provider (web.de). Somehow this failed (both in outlook and directly at the web.de website via firefox), and I reset my password for this email. Firefox did not allow me to login directly into my mail on the web.de website, whereas I succeeded to do so in Safari. I updated the new password in outlook, all good. I turned off enhanced tracking protection, cleared all cookies and history, restarted the computer and still cannot login to web.de via firefox. Any ideas?
creator: rbollongino

title: Websites using Google fonts not displayed correctly
content:
When visiting websites that use Google fonts the fonts are not rendered/displayed correctly. I am using the latest version of Mozilla. I seached the internet for solutions and tried many gfx.font_rendering settings in the config but no result. Changing Sandbox security settings do not help either. Unselecting "Allow pages to choose their own fonts" in the settings works but this is not my preferred solution because this way all websites are displayed in the same fonts.

The attached images are from website https://onlinevideoconverter.com/ which is using the Raleway font. The image which is clearly readable if visited in Edge. The bad one is from Mozilla. Other browsers display the websites using google fonts correctly.

I would like to find a solution for this issue because I regularly visit news-sites that use google fonts and to read it properly I always have to switch to a different browser.
creator: sammyF

content: Youtube, sometimes, loads for ~5-10 seconds on average for no reason, doesn't load the video or audio at all.
